How a sandwich changed Tabitha Brown's life
Plant-Based Vegan Diet, Positive Mindset, and Serving Others with Tabitha Brown

speakerTopic.text:
Tabitha Brown is one of the most popular personalities in the world, with millions of followers on social media whom she inspires to live and eat well with her blend of homespun wisdom and delicious home cooking. With her relatable personality and health struggles, approachable and nonjudgmental take on plant-based living, and warm voice reflecting her Southern upbringing, Tabitha connects to her audience with a good story and gentle hand. The most important lesson Tabitha shares with her audience is how to make a life for themselves that is rooted in kindness and love, both for themselves and for others.

Tabitha doesn't just spout inspirational platitudes. She roots her lessons in stories about her own life, career, faith, and family in her down-to-earth manner.  The conversation will be structured around Tab’s catchphrases that her fans know and love, including:

Hello There!: Introduction, and why hope, joy, and clarity are so very needed

That’s Your Business: Defining yourself, and being okay with that

Have the Most Amazing Day…: Choosing joy and living with intention

But Don’t Go Messin' Up No One Else's: Learning to walk in kindness even when the world doesn’t feel kind

Like So, Like That: Living life without measurement

Very Good: Living in peace and creating good from the bad

Rich with personal and inspirational stories, Tabitha will be eagerly embraced by audiences whether they are familiar with her or not. Following the conversation, they will feel seen, loved, and heard.
speakerTopic.title: Feeding the Soul: Finding Our Way to Joy, Love, and Freedom

speakerBioSummary.text:
• Tabitha Brown satisfies the hunger of millions with her unique approach to vegan food and her wholesome, comedic personality.
  • She has amassed over 4 million followers across platforms, 2 million of which were acquired in 40 days on TikTok, earning her the coined title of “America’s Mom.”
  • Brown has led a vegan lifestyle, promoting the importance of physical, mental, and emotional health to achieve fulfillment.    
  • Tabitha is the host of the YouTube Originals series, Tab Time, and the upcoming Food Network show, It’s CompliPlated. 
  • She created her own signature Sunshine Seasoning with McCormick, which sold out in 39 minutes, and partnered with Target to launch four limited-time lifestyle collections. 
  • She released a memoir, Feeding The Soul (Because It’s My Business), which instantly became a #1 NYT Bestseller, and quickly followed it up with her NYT Bestselling cookbook, Cooking from the Spirit.
  • Tabitha has landed notable theatrical features on Will & Grace, The Chi, and The Conners.

speakerBiography.text:
Tabitha Brown satisfies the hunger of millions with her unique approach to veganism and her wholesome, comedic personality on the daily. She is a home base for learning new recipes, acquiring imparted wisdom, or enjoying a good laugh.

Now a New York Times Bestselling Author of her debut book “Feeding the Soul (Because It’s My Business!)”, the North Carolina-born actress, vegan lifestyle personality, mother, and wife has also taken various business ventures by storm. Alongside making her own healthy hair care line called Donna’s Recipe, being named Equity Partner of Orro, developing a Calm Sleep Story, creating her signature Sunshine Seasoning with McCormick, and working on her second book, she has landed notable theatrical features on Will & Grace, The Chi, and The Conners.

Tabitha is the host of the YouTube Originals series, Tab Time, a series that showcases plant-based cooking, storytelling, and motivational speaking with children, educating them on how to live fulfilled lives. She can also be seen in the Food Network's It's CompliPlated, a hilarious new cooking show that features determined chefs attempting to please the most particular panel of eaters with the same plate of food accommodating all the different diets, food allergies, and tastes in their household. 

She’s earned the coined title of “America’s mom” with her 12 million-plus followers across platforms and teaches all of us about having faith, perseverance, paving our own unique path to achieving dreams, and being our authentic selves.

speakerReview.text: Tabitha was amazing! I think she is truly the kindest, most sincere person I have met.
speakerReview.title: SPEAKER REVIEW

speakerReview.text: We loved hosting Tabitha and our students have reacted very well to being able to interact with her. They loved seeing someone so fun and personable like Tabitha!
speakerReview.title: SPEAKER REVIEW

speakerReview.text: Today was great! Tabitha was amazing, the meet and greet was amazing.
speakerReview.title: SPEAKER REVIEW

speakerReview.text: She was amazing! So kind with the students and answered so many questions even while cooking. I think this was exactly the kind of midterms season wholesomeness students were wanting!

speakerReview.text: We had a great time withTabitha! The event was very well received.

speakerReview.text: Tabitha was very engaging with the audience questions and made food that everyone really enjoyed!
speakerReview.title: SPEAKER REVIEW

speakerReview.text: My team is smiling from ear to ear right now - Tabitha NAILED IT! Her talk resonated with our team so well!
